name: Caspar
tagline: Caspar is a php 5.3-based mvc framework
body:
CASPAR MVC FRAMEWORK
-------
Caspar is an mvc framework for php 5.3-based applications.


* GETTING STARTED *
See the GETTING_STARTED file for how to setup Caspar and your first application


* REPORTING ISSUES *
If you find any issues, please report them in the issue tracker on our website:
http://issues.thebuggenie.com
